item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, April 18, 2025 at 1:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Defold: cross-platform game engine (113 points | 32 comments)
2. NSF halts grant awards while staff do second review (4 points | discuss)
3. Gemini 2.5 Flash (835 points | 429 comments)
4. Kagi Assistant is now available to all users (319 points | 178 comments)
5. Potatoes in the Mail (349 points | 150 comments)
6. Unikernel Linux (UKL) (2023) (32 points | 4 comments)
7. I analyzed chord progressions in 680k songs (185 points | 80 comments)
8. An intro to DeepSeek's distributed file system (553 points | 87 comments)
9. Ocean Tides and the Earth's Rotation (2001) (10 points | 1 comment)
10. What do I think about Lua after shipping a project with 60k lines of code? (154 points | 62 comments)
11. Decreased CO2 during breathwork: emergence of altered states of consciousness (245 points | 112 comments)
12. Curiosity rover finds large carbon deposits on Mars (18 points | discuss)
13. Aqua Tofana: The 17th Century Husband Killer (44 points | 15 comments)
14. Is it possible to write plain C iOS app in 2025? (95 points | 48 comments)
15. 1,700 Year Old Egg Never Broke (49 points | 22 comments)
16. Tracking types of non-parents in the United States (20 points | 30 comments)
17. Multipaint: Draw pictures with color limitations of 8-bit and 16-bit platforms (11 points | discuss)
18. Researcher proposes model replacing dark energy/matter to explain universe (43 points | 41 comments)
19. Deafening Silence from the Cybersecurity Industry (206 points | 113 comments)
20. The Size of Packets (59 points | 24 comments)
21. Discord's face scanning age checks 'start of a bigger shift' (253 points | 309 comments)
22. Once banned, Poland's stately 18th century dance garners UNESCO honors (2024) (49 points | 24 comments)
23. Milwaukee M18 Battery Reverse Engineering (187 points | 81 comments)
24. HDR‑Infused Emoji (245 points | 135 comments)
25. I gave up on self-hosted Sentry (2024) (130 points | 100 comments)
26. AMP and why emails are not (and should never be) interactive (23 points | 5 comments)
27. Viral ChatGPT trend is doing 'reverse location search' from photos (64 points | 29 comments)
28. Unauthenticated Remote Code Execution in Erlang/OTP SSH (182 points | 48 comments)
29. Google is illegally monopolizing online advertising tech, judge rules (779 points | 413 comments)
30. Show HN: AgentAPI – HTTP API for Claude Code, Goose, Aider, and Codex (137 points | 13 comments)
